item.description:
8:00 PM - Mimi Rabson & Bruno Råberg Solos and Duos
Rutman's Violins
11 Westland Ave
Boston, MA
617 578-0066
http://www.rutmansvio...

Ticket info: $10 suggested donation

Mimi Rabson (violin) and Bruno Råberg (bass) are not only recognized as world-class improvisers but also as composers. As performers they cover musical styles ranging from classical music to jazz, funk to world music. As composers they are each creating vocabulary drawing on all those sources.

Teaming up for this series of concerts, Rabson and Råberg will present a collection of unique compositions and improvisations. http://brunoraberg.co...
item.name: The Boston Jazz March Meetup
